pasokin.title: PASOKIN
pasokin.shortTags: WordPress, eCommerce, Blog, Responsive, Animations, Design
pasokin.description:
Unique marketing website with eCommerce functionality that was built for a US Candy manufacturer.
Website uses WordPress for the backend. It is fully responsive and has blogging functionality. It features custom graphics and intuitive UX/UI.

kritsberg_property_group.title: KRITSBERG PROPERTY GROUP
kritsberg_property_group.description: Custom mobile friendly website built for one of the NYC's real estate investment companies. Lots of animated design elements. A unique way of presenting information on the completed projects & portfolio.

21sthapilos.title: 21STHAPILOS
21sthapilos.description: Developed high end website for music & video distributing. Fully responsive, W3C compliant layout. Cross browser compatibility. WordPress driven. Video and widget embedding.

pier_and_lev.title: PIER AND LEV
pier_and_lev.shortTags: WordPress, Blog, Responsive, Animations, Design, UI/UX
pier_and_lev.description: A high end marketing website built for manufacturer of exquisite handmade timepieces that incorporate cutting-edge technology, rare materials and state of the art construction. Horizontal scrolling animations. WordPress backend. Fully responsive layout. Cross browser compatibility.

cheese_studio.title: CHEESE STUDIO
cheese_studio.description: Luxury marketing website design for a European wedding studio. Video embedding, Strategically placed contact forms, custom graphics, blogging functionality. WordPress based website with a fully responsive layout and cross browser compatibility.

chk-in_cam.title: CHK-IN CAM
chk-in_cam.description:
Website redesign
Custom website redesign project for a progressive company that specializes in home gadgets production. The website is built on the WordPress platform and features fully responsive layout, custom graphics, contact forms and more.

lakewood_organic.title: LAKEWOOD ORGANIC
lakewood_organic.description: Website for a premier organic juices company. Website features store locator functionality, completely custom banners and graphics, multiple transition effects. Built on WordPress CMS with a fully responsive layout.

anvilation.title: ANVILATION
anvilation.description: Design a new website for a hybrid social media / video production start up company. Website designed to have a vintage feel merged with the modern UI / UX. Created custom banners and icons and other custom design elements

casa_del_mar_luxury_villas.title: CASA DEL MAR LUXURY VILLAS
casa_del_mar_luxury_villas.description: Created a new website for a luxury resort in Bahamas. Design is based on a modern UI / UX methodology combining themes of both tropical location and luxury aesthetics. Integrated booking system built on a WordPress platform.

united_auto_rental.title: UNITED AUTO RENTAL
united_auto_rental.description: Cutting edge WordPress based website built for a Car Rental Company. Custom Calculators, Complex Rental options, Video embedding, Social Media options integration, Google Maps integration. Custom designed Graphic elements. Fully responsive layout. Payment options integration.

aetherpal.title: AETHERPAL
aetherpal.description: New custom website for a mobile support company. Website is built on a WordPress back end and included custom designed animations, CSS transitions, document downloads, news and management profiles. Website is fully responsive.

aka_media_inc.title: AKA MEDIA INC
aka_media_inc.description: Designed and developed a website for a Chicago based film Production Company with several custom forms, customizable project templates, video embedding, video portfolio, and various other sections. Built on WordPress with a fully responsive layout.

keys_bahamas_realty.title: KEYS BAHAMAS REALTY
keys_bahamas_realty.description: Designed and developed a cutting edge real estate website. WordPress driven. Multilingual. Fully responsive layout. MLS integration. Custom graphics.

colony.title: COLONY
colony.description: Developed a cutting edge website based on the newest video technology. Created a valid, cross browser compatible mark up with a responsive layout. The website is built on a WordPress platform and features HTML 5 video player that is viewable from any modern browser.

down_n_dirty_hat.title: DOWN N DIRTY HAT
down_n_dirty_hat.description: A trendy WordPress driven eShop built for America’s best conurty wetsren hats brand. Created a valid, cross browser compatible mark up with a responsive layout. Features robust ecommerce system.

glamerella_jewelry.title: GLAMERELLA JEWELRY
glamerella_jewelry.shortTags: Design, Development, WordPress, Responsive, Custom, eCommerce
glamerella_jewelry.description:
Web Design for Fashion Jewelry Ecommerce Site
Custom design and development of an amazing, highly versatile fashion jewelry ecommerce website. Website is built on a WordPress back end and features subtle CSS animations, custom check out system, social media feed integration and more. Website is fully responsive and cross browser compatible.

kuafu_properties.title: KUAFU PROPERTIES
kuafu_properties.description: Custom designed and developed corporate website for a real estate NYC development company. Website is built on WordPress with portfolio showcase, corporate management profiles. Website is responsive and multilingual (English and Chinese)

overpeck_corporate_park.title: OVERPECK CORPORATE PARK
overpeck_corporate_park.shortTags: Design, Development, WordPress, Responsive, Custom, UI/UX
overpeck_corporate_park.description: Cutting edge website created for a premier real estate management company. Unique user interface. WordPress backend. Fully responsive, W3C compliant layout.

ygrene_energy.title: YGRENE ENERGY
ygrene_energy.description: Designed and developed a complex premium real estate website for one of the largest Moscow real estate agencies. Website contains property database integration and various search filters, custom maps, multi-tiered user admin, multi-language support and much more.

chefit.title: CHEFit
chefit.description: Unique, custom design created for a startup Meal prep. company. An 'All on one plate' type of design approach. Custom banners and graphics.

biteaway.title: Biteaway
biteaway.description: Beautiful, dental care product website. WordPress based. Valid, cross browser compatible mark up with a responsive layout. Custom subscriptions functionality. Video embedding.

mythraeum.title: Mythraeum
mythraeum.description: An awesome Blogging website created based on client’s specifications for a successful author that specializes in modern Mythology. WordPress CMS. Fully responsive layout. Blog posts, photo galleries, feedback forms and much more.

BlakeGriggs.title: Blake & Griggs
BlakeGriggs.shortTags: WordPress, UI/UX, Blog, Responsive, Animations, Design
BlakeGriggs.description: Custom website for real estate investment company created in a full screen format with lots of animated design elements, parallax, and a fully responsive layout. Website uses WP as a backend

cpr_to_the_rescue.title: CPR To The Rescue
cpr_to_the_rescue.shortTags: Design, Development, WordPress, Responsive, eCommerce , UI/UX
cpr_to_the_rescue.description: Custom eCommerce website for CPR training company that features custom class scheduling calendar functionality and user-controlled personal area, fully responsive layout, store of 1st aid supplies, blog and other custom functionality
